channel.title: Oddsends on BMMB554
channel.description: Recent content in Oddsends on BMMB554

item.title: Lecture 19: Important odds and ends
item.description: Everything is a distribution All information necessary to get ahead is freely (or almost freely) available. Learn how to speak Learn how to write The Title Says It All The Abstract and the Elevator Talk: A Tale of Two Summaries “It was a cold and rainy night”: Set the Scene with a Good Introduction Who, What, When, Where, How, and Why: The Ingredients in the Recipe for a Successful Methods Section Show Your Cards: The Results Section and the Poker Game If an IRDAM Journal Is What You Choose, Then Sequential Results Are What You Use Put Your Best Figure Forward: Line Graphs and Scattergrams Bars and Pies Make Better Desserts than Figures (also see this) Bring Your Best to the Table The Discussion Section: Your Closing Argument Giving Credit: Citations and References How to Write a Rave Review Top 10 Tips for Responding to Reviewer and Editor Comments Passing the Paternité Test (also see this) Consider academia
